Ependymal Cell.Comment: We are not sure whether ependymal cells should be considered a type of ependymoglial cell
Ependymal Cell.Definition: A neurectoderm derived cell that lines the neural lumen (Cell Ontology)., An epithelial cell lining the walls of the ventricles of the brain and central canal of the spinal cord that secret cerebral spinal fluid. (Peters, Palay and Webster, 1991).
